Lee County Courts – Opelika, AL

Circuit Court

Located at the Lee County Justice Center, the Circuit Court handles major civil and criminal cases.

District Court

Also at the Justice Center, the District Court hears misdemeanors, traffic offenses, and civil matters with smaller amounts in controversy.

Municipal Courts in Opelika/Auburn

These courts handle city ordinance violations and misdemeanors occurring within city limits.

Court Tips

  • Arrive early to allow time for security screening.
  • Dress conservatively and turn off electronic devices.
  • Be respectful to court staff and the judge.

Contact Gabriel Smith if you need assistance with a Lee County court matter.
